Build fallback sandbox configuration (no OS sandbox)

Source: R/sandbox-fallback.R
build_sandbox_fallback.Rd

Used when no platform-specific sandbox is available. Returns a config with NULL wrapper and profile so the session starts without any OS-level isolation.

Usage

build_sandbox_fallback(socket_path, r_home)

Arguments

socket_path

Path to the UDS socket

r_home

Path to the R installation

Value

A sandbox config list with wrapper = NULL and profile_path = NULL
